title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page displays improper field types
description: In the Integration build 09/17, the Project Properties Info page uses text fields, which looks poor on motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page displays text fields for information, causing a poor visual appearance on motif platforms.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should utilize readonly labels instead of text fields for presenting information. This change would improve the visual appearance on motif platforms.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties Info page on a motif platform.
2. Observe the use of text fields for information display.
3. Compare the appearance and functionality with readonly labels for presenting the same information.
